dcterms:creator: X. Hu
F. Wang
D. Zhang
dcterms:description: The THU-EP dataset consists of EEG data collected from 80 college students while they watched emotional video clips designed to elicit various emotions. It aims to provide a benchmark for cross-subject emotion recognition.
dcterms:title: THU-EP

dcterms:creator: R.-N. Duan
J.-Y. Zhu
B.-L. Lu
dcterms:description: The SEED dataset contains EEG data from 15 subjects who watched film clips designed to elicit three types of emotions: positive, neutral, and negative. It is widely used for evaluating emotion recognition algorithms.
dcterms:title: SEED
